dcterms:description: This dataset contains acoustic cues of sarcasm in Thai, analyzed through various vocal parameters such as speech rate, F0 mean, F0 range, amplitude mean, and amplitude range, as well as gender differences in the expression of sarcasm.
dcterms:title: Acoustic cues of sarcasm in Thai

dcterms:creator: Wanlapapaporn Sonboonta
dcterms:description: This dataset includes an acoustic analysis of the Thai Wh-word [?arai] in both direct and indirect speech acts, focusing on the acoustic characteristics of speech.
dcterms:title: Acoustic characteristics of Thai sarcasm
